category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 24 (Employment and Competency Development Committee)
contents: Article 24 (Employment and Competency Development Committee) The Employment and Competency Development Committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. Revised 2023. 7. 5. 1. Support for employment of retired athletes 2. Preparation of career support plan for active athletes 3. Matters related to plan and operation of retired athlete support project 4. Other matters recognized as being in line with the functions of the Employment and Competency Development Committee Matters submitted by the Chairman 5. Deleted January 31, 2019 [This Article Newly Inserted April 3, 2017]
